name: v1.0.0
body:
\*\*\***Breaking Change**\*\*\*

PRs Merged:
- Refatcor authentication #57

---

Thanks to all those that have contributed over the last few years, we've finally reached a v1.0.0 release :tada: 

This v1.0.0 release introduces changes to certain authentication methods:

- Renamed `GetUserAccessToken` method to `RequestUserAccessToken`
- Renamed `GetAppAccessToken` method to `RequestAppAccessToken`
- Add two new methods `GetUserAccessToken` and `GetAppAccessToken` for returning the currently set access tokens

See the updated [authentication docs](https://github.com/nicklaw5/helix/blob/master/docs/authentication_docs.md) for details

name: v0.7.0
body:
\*\*\***Breaking Change**\*\*\*

PRs Merged:
- Refatcor authentication #55

PRs Reverted:
- Change GetAuthorizationURL to response_type=token, and add Scopes #51 (See #54)

Fixes:
- Missing response_type "code" #53

---

This release introduces some slight changes to the authentication flow that come in the form of a breaking change. `NewClient()` no longer accepts a `Scopes` parameter. Instead you must pass any required scopes to the `GetAuthorizationURL()` method if using user access tokens, or to the `GetAppAccessToken()` if using app access tokens.

See the updated [authentication docs](https://github.com/nicklaw5/helix/blob/master/docs/authentication_docs.md) for details
